articles.title: Elon Musk Claims Tesla Cybertruck Can Function as a Boat for Short Periods
articles.summary: Tesla's Cybertruck, an all-electric vehicle initially unveiled in 2019, will have the capability to function briefly as a boat. This new feature allows the Cybertruck to cross rivers, lakes and seas that aren't too choppy, adding to its multi-functional appeal.

articles.title: NIVEA sets a Guinness World Record with largest online video Chain of People Passing and Applying Moisturiser
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: NIVEA India achieved a GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS title with its NIVEA Soft Fresh Batch 2024 campaign, centered around the NIVEA Soft moisturizer. The campaign involved an online video chain of people applying the moisturizer, with participation driven by influencers and a trendy hook step from the NIVEA Soft anthem. Winners of the campaign receive an all-expenses-paid international trip and features in NIVEA's digital ads.

articles.title: Machine to collect trash? Trial begins in Greater Noida markets
articles.author: Shafaque Alam
articles.summary: The Greater Noida Industrial Development Authority (GNIDA) has begun a one-month trial of a battery-operated litter-picking machine in local markets. This machine uses suction technology to collect garbage and aims to enhance cleanliness and waste management in the city's public spaces. The authority will decide on purchasing the machine if the trial results are satisfactory.

articles.title: Samsung teased its stretchable Micro LED display at CES - my phone started to feel boring
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Samsung Display, an innovation arm of the Korean electronics giant, is showcasing a stretchable Micro LED display concept. This display features subjects physically pushing out, demonstrating a new form of screen technology for monitors, tablets, and commercial displays.

articles.title: Nvidia Nemotron Models: Accelerating AI Agent Development with LLMs and VLMs
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nvidia introduced the Nemotron Model Families, a suite of AI tools including Llama Nemotron LLMs and Cosmos Nemotron VLMs, designed for enterprise applications like customer support and fraud detection. These models integrate language and vision capabilities, and are available in Nano, Super, and Ultra sizes. The company also provides the Nvidia NeMo platform and Nvidia AI Blueprints to help developers customize and deploy the new models.

articles.title: China's newest humanoid robot is ready to serve like never before
articles.summary: Pudu Robotics has launched the D9, a new humanoid robot designed to perform various tasks across different industries. The D9 can walk at speeds of up to 4.5 mph and carry loads up to 44 pounds. Its potential applications range from cleaning to warehouse duties, offering sophisticated AI-driven natural interaction capabilities.

articles.title: Morning Fresh Gives Lady One-Year Supply Of Products To Support Her Relationship
articles.author: Gistlover
articles.summary: Morning Fresh awarded a lady a year's supply of its dish soap after a post on X (formerly Twitter) about her suggestion to dilute the product.

articles.title: Ofer Gift: The revolutionary card opening shopping worlds
articles.author: RONIT MATHIAS
articles.summary: Ofer Malls, part of the Melisron Group, launched Ofer Gift, a gift card service. The gift card offers shopping experience at any store in any of the 18 malls in the chain nationwide and is accepted by 100% of the stores in the Ofer Malls. To mark the launch, Ofer Malls is running a campaign with an investment of approximately NIS 2.5 million.

articles.title: Elden Ring Nightreign Network Test: Schedule, registration date, time, platforms and gameplay
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Bandai Namco is offering players early access to Elden Ring Nightreign through a network test scheduled for February 2025. This test, available on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S, aims to assess the game's performance and connectivity before its official launch, allowing players to experience a limited portion of the game.

articles.title: Crafted for Creators and Gamers, New Consumer Storage Solutions Empower Creativity and Stylize Gameplay
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Western Digital, under its SanDisk brand, has launched a range of new storage solutions at CES 2025.  The new product lines includes the SanDisk Creator Series, designed for content creators, featuring products like the SanDisk Creator Phone SSD, microSD Card, SD UHS-II Card, Phone Drive, USB-C Flash Drive, Pro Portable SSD, and Desk Drive. Additionally, SanDisk is releasing Fortnite-themed storage solutions, including a Portable SSD and USB Flash Drive, targeting gaming enthusiasts.

articles.title: 24 Target Products That Will Make It Actually Possible To Get Your Kids Out The Door In Time
articles.author: Sally Dadisman
articles.summary: Target offers a variety of products to streamline the morning routine. These include the Apple AirTag for locating lost keys, a robot vacuum for cleaning up messes, an electric toothbrush for kids that uses a timer and connects to an app, and a coffee machine for quick caffeine fixes. Walmart also offers the Tide To Go pen for stain removal.

articles.title: With SteamOS Expanding Beyond Steam Deck, Is It Game Over For Bazzite?
articles.author: Jason Evangelho
articles.summary: Bazzite, a Linux distribution, is an enhanced SteamOS experience for handheld gaming. It is designed to address SteamOS limitations, such as package installs and printing support. Bazzite offers features, non-Steam gaming support and faster community improvements, which differentiates itself from SteamOS.

articles.title: Roborock at CES 2025: Rocking a new era with AI-powered innovation
articles.author: Georgie Peru
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the Saros Series robotic vacuums (Z70, Saros 10, and Saros 10R) at CES 2025, featuring advanced navigation, object recognition, and automated maintenance. Additionally, they are introducing the F25 Series of wet/dry vacuums, designed for versatile cleaning with app and voice control integration. These new products demonstrate Roborock's commitment to AI-powered home cleaning.

articles.title: Will there be anything to represent at all? We have complete specifications and pictures of the Galaxy S25 (Ultra) series
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 series, featuring three models: the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra. The series includes the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, Qi2 wireless charging support, and improvements to the camera and display technology. The launch event is scheduled for January 22, 2025, in San Jose, where the second-generation Galaxy Ring and a new VR headset are also expected to be revealed.

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Love tech? The best is yet to come
articles.author: Marc Saltzman
articles.summary: SanDisk is releasing the Creator Phone SSD, a MagSafe-compatible external solid-state drive with up to 2TB of storage for smartphones, designed to directly capture footage, supporting Apple 'Pro-Res' 4K video at 60fps, and will include one month of Adobe Creative Cloud subscription. Kirin has developed an Electric Salt Spoon which uses electric current to simulate saltiness, offering a potential solution for reducing sodium consumption.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Renders Leak: Design, Colors, and Specs Revealed Ahead of Unpacked
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Ultra is anticipated with design changes like softened corners and new color options, including black, gray, and silvery variants. The non-Ultra S25 series may come in light blue, dark blue, light green, and silver. The S25 Ultra is expected to feature a 200-megapixel main camera and advanced telephoto lenses, while the S25 Plus is rumored to include upgraded Snapdragon 8 Elite mobile processors and a minty-colored variant.

articles.title: TCL Unveils Groundbreaking Smart Home Security Innovations at CES 2025
articles.author: TCL Smart Home Security
articles.summary: TCL unveiled its latest smart home security innovations at CES 2025, including the Smart Lock D1 Ultra, Smart Lock D1 Pro, and Solar Security Camera Cam B1. The Smart Lock D1 Ultra integrates a smart lock, security camera, video doorbell, and display screen. TCL Security Cam B1 combines security features with an eco-conscious design.

articles.title: See what this lady got because of a post she made on social media
articles.author: Naij
articles.summary: A Nigerian lady received a one-year supply of Morning Fresh detergent. The supply relates to a viral post about an experience at her boyfriend's place. This action can be seen as a marketing activity by Morning Fresh.

articles.title: These 5 wacky phone concepts are the future of mobile
articles.author: Chris Hachey
articles.summary: The ASUS Rog Phone 9, launched in November 2024, features AI capabilities and a high refresh rate display. The CMF Phone 1 offers users customization through detachable accessories. Huawei is pushing boundaries with its new tri-fold Mate XT phone.

articles.title: Cloud Phone by CloudMosa review: Making feature phones 'smart'
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: CloudMosa is launching Cloud Phone, an app platform utilizing cloud computing to enable web apps on low-cost feature phones. In partnership with companies like HMD Global (the makers of Nokia phones), Cloud Phone allows users to access apps and internet content like YouTube, Facebook, and BBC on devices that typically lack the hardware capabilities.

articles.title: Nectar of the Gods Anti-Aging Cream Ageless Beauty !
articles.summary: Nectar of the Gods, a new skincare product, repairs damage at the cellular level while restoring hydration and elasticity. The product features clinically tested ingredients and a non-invasive formula, addressing multiple signs of aging simultaneously.

articles.title: MiniPhoneX Price in SA, CA, UK, AU, NZ, DE, FR 'Official'
articles.author: Malebiotix999
articles.summary: The MiniPhoneX is a new compact smartphone offering essential features in a small, portable design.  It boasts a high-resolution touchscreen, a robust processor, and long battery life. The MiniPhoneX is available for purchase through its official website and potentially on e-commerce platforms like Amazon and eBay.

articles.title: Top 5 Foundation Makeup Products for a Perfect Look
articles.summary: Lakmé introduces the Perfecting Liquid Foundation known for its lightweight and dewy finish. Mamaearth launches the Glow Serum Foundation Mini Tube with Vitamin C and turmeric. Maybelline's Fit Me Foundation is designed for oily skin, providing a matte and poreless finish. Swiss Beauty offers Matte Shiny Pearl Water Drop Blemish Balm BB Foundation with a long-lasting matte finish and Just Herbs Serum Foundation for Face Makeup provides sun protection and a dewy finish.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Pre-Order And Release Dates
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event. Pre-orders are expected to open shortly after the event, with potential delays being considered. Samsung is offering incentives like vouchers and exclusive deals during the pre-order period, with deliveries anticipated to begin on February 7.

articles.title: I went hands-on with the world's 1st 'rollable' laptop — it's more than just a gimmick
articles.author: Keumars Afifi-Sabet
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching its rollable laptop in spring for $3,499, targeting creative professionals. The laptop features an extendable 14-inch (to 16.7-inch) OLED display, up to Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, Intel Arc Xe2 Graphics, and up to 32GB of RAM.

articles.title: New Staten Island Wendy's really is going to open
articles.author: Pamela Silvestri
articles.summary: Wendy's is preparing to open a new restaurant at 2970 Hylan Blvd. The upcoming New Dorp location will feature digital kiosks and an outdoor dining patio, enhancing the customer experience.

articles.title: Did Ninja just soft-launch the coolest gadget of 2025? Here's everything we know about the Ninja Swirl
articles.summary: Ninja is preparing to launch the Ninja Swirl, a new gadget designed for crafting soft-serve ice cream. Building upon the success of the Ninja Creami Deluxe, the Ninja Swirl allows users to personalize their ice cream with various flavors and dietary preferences, offering both traditional scoops and soft-serve swirls. Currently, a waitlist is open for those interested in purchasing the Ninja Swirl upon its release.

articles.title: Where can I buy the Mini PhoneX Smartphone? [Order Now]
articles.author: Revitalized Buy
articles.summary: The MiniPhoneX, a compact and affordable smartphone, has been launched. It boasts a portable design with a 4-5 inch screen, a capable camera, and a long-lasting battery.  The MiniPhoneX is available for purchase through its official website.

articles.title: What is Microsoft Edge?: Everything you need to know about Microsoft's internet browser for Windows
articles.summary: Microsoft has updated Microsoft Edge, a Chromium-based browser, with improved features and benefits, making it a competitive alternative to Chrome and Firefox. Users can download Microsoft Edge on PC, Mac, iPhone, or Android devices and synchronize their browsing data with a free Microsoft account.

articles.title: Al Futtaim unveils smart lifestyle advisor Blue AI
articles.summary: Al Futtaim has launched Blue AI, an AI-powered feature within the Blue Rewards app, designed to personalize customer experiences. Blue AI acts as a smart lifestyle advisor, providing tailored insights and streamlining the shopping experience for users. Initially launching in the UAE, it is expected to expand to eight markets within the first year.

articles.title: What is Microsoft Edge?: Everything you need to know about Microsoft's internet browser for Windows
articles.author: Ross James
articles.summary: Microsoft Edge, initially released in 2015, has been updated to include Microsoft's AI tool Copilot and the Bing search engine. The current version of Edge is built on Chromium, allowing users to use extensions meant for Google Chrome and extensions in the Microsoft Store. Users can download Edge from Microsoft's website for various platforms.

articles.title: Samsung Begins Mass Production of Rollable OLED Screens for Laptops
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung Display is set to mass-produce rollable OLED screens for laptops starting in April 2025. These screens, featured in Lenovo's ThinkBook Plus G6 Rollable, offer a flexible display that expands from 14 to 16.7 inches and are thinner and more energy-efficient than previous models. The company also showcased a prototype 18.1-inch foldable OLED monitor, eliminating the visible crease common in foldable screens.

articles.title: Lidl launches brand new Dyson fan dupe – it's £280 cheaper and perfect for staying warm in winter and cool in summer
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: LIDL has launched the Silvercrest Bladeless Tower Fan Heater, a cheaper alternative to the Dyson Tower Fan, priced at £69.99. The fan features heating and cooling functions, multiple speed and oscillation settings, and is available in two colors. Lidl is also selling Silvercrest Bladeless Desk Fan Heater for £49.99.

articles.title: Lidl launches brand new Dyson fan dupe – it's £280 cheaper and perfect for staying warm in winter and cool in summer
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: LIDL has launched a new Bladeless Tower Fan, a dupe of the Dyson Tower Fan, priced at £69.99. The fan features an LED mood light, 20 speed settings, multiple operating modes, and includes a remote control with a three-year warranty. Besides the Tower Fan, LIDL also introduced desk versions of the Bladeless fan with 10 speed settings and adjustable temperature control.

articles.title: Lidl launches brand new Dyson fan dupe – it's £280 cheaper and perfect for staying warm in winter and cool in summer
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Lidl has launched the Silvercrest Bladeless Tower Fan Heater, a dupe of the Dyson Tower Fan, priced at £69.99. This fan features heating and cooling functions, multiple speed and oscillation settings, and operating modes. Lidl is also selling the Silvercrest Bladeless Desk Fan Heater for £49.99, which also has heating and cooling functions.

articles.title: I am thrilled by Nvidia's cute petaflop mini PC wonder, and it's time for Jensen's law: it takes 100 months to get equal AI performance for 1/25th of the cost
articles.author: Desire Athow
articles.summary: Nvidia launched Project DIGITS, a mini PC supercomputer powered by the GB10 SoC with a Blackwell GPU, priced at $3,000. This system delivers 1,000 Teraflops at FP4 precision and is designed to bring AI supercomputing capabilities to a broader audience, including data scientists and AI researchers. Nvidia aims to disrupt the market by offering powerful AI processing at a lower cost and expanding its influence beyond hyperscalers.

articles.title: ⚡Galaxy S25 Series: Check Expected Price, Specifications and Features of Upcoming Smartphones From Samsung
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22, 2025. The series is anticipated to include the Samsung Galaxy S25, Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim, and Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra models.

articles.title: 23 Target Pieces For Anyone Who Wants To Feel Cozy Head To Toe, Every Second Of The Day
articles.author: Haley Lyndes
articles.summary: Target is offering a range of new clothing items, including baggy joggers, mock turtlenecks, cozy slippers, and various sweaters and cardigans.  The items are highlighted for their comfort, style, and versatility, making them suitable for both lounging and everyday wear, with specific items such as wide-leg satin pants positioned as alternatives to typical casual wear.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series: Latest AI Features Revealed Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch its Galaxy S series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 23, 2025, introducing the Now Bar, a smart assistant powered by Galaxy AI within the One UI 7 update. The Now Bar will provide personalized notifications and quick access to frequently used apps, and other AI-driven features are teased, including voice command capabilities.

articles.title: Moto G05 launched in India: Check out the price, specifications, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G05 smartphone in India on January 7th, priced at Rs 6,999, with sales starting January 13th on Flipkart, Motorola, and major retail outlets. The Moto G05 features a 6.67-inch HD+ display, MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme CPU, a 50MP primary camera, and a 5,200mAh battery with 18W fast charging.

articles.title: Caviar Hong Kong - Nomad's Online Caviar Shop HK Announces Kaluga Hybrid Variant
articles.author: Plentisoft
articles.summary: NOMAD Caviar has expanded its product range with new premium caviars, gourmet accompaniments like NOMAD Salmon and Caviar Tart, caviar accessories, and unique caviar gift sets such as "Date Night & The Perfect Gift" and "Party Pack". The company provides online shopping and next-day delivery in Hong Kong.

articles.title: NIVEA India Sets a GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS With Largest Online Video Chain of People Passing and Applying Moisturiser
articles.summary: NIVEA India's Soft Fresh Batch 2024 achieved a GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS title for the largest online video chain of people passing and applying moisturizer. The initiative, promoting NIVEA Soft, saw a 30% increase in participation from last year, engaging users with the NIVEA Soft anthem and influencer partnerships on MOJ.  Winners will receive international trips, features in NIVEA's digital ads, vocational courses and subscription to NIVEA's full product range.

articles.title: Betrayer of main characters ‘Sonny Boy' discovered in archive
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Yoast SEO, a WordPress plugin, optimizes websites to improve content quality and site performance. It features schema markup and technical SEO tools to improve search engine rankings. The plugin's setup wizard guides users through the initial configuration and encourages the use of keyword variations.

articles.title: Tesla launched the new Model Y in China. Here's what you need to know
articles.author: Stan Schroeder
articles.summary: Tesla has launched a refreshed version of its Model Y, internally codenamed "Juniper", in China and other Asian markets. The updated Model Y is currently labeled as "Launch Series" and is considered a limited release as the company increases production.  The new model includes exterior design changes, including a camera in the front bumper.

articles.title: The Tesla Model Y gets a Cybertruck-inspired facelift
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Model Y features a new lightbar on its rear. Model Y has a more streamlined design.

articles.title: Small small but premium: FMCG bets on ‘access packs' to boost demand
articles.author: Ratna Bhushan
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever, Britannia, ITC, Godrej Consumer Products, Colgate Palmolive and Adani Wilmar are introducing smaller, lower-priced 'access packs' of premium products across various retail channels. This strategy aims to target price-sensitive consumers and boost demand amidst an urban slowdown. Examples include HUL's Rs 10 Surf Excel Liquid pack and Colgate's select premium toothpaste variants at Rs 80. Britannia has introduced ambient cheese sachets at Rs 15 each.

articles.title: 43 Problem-Solving Products For The Little Things You Ignored Around Your House For All Of 2024
articles.summary: Covogoods, a small family-owned business, offers the customizable CovoBox, made from reclaimed books and sustainable wood, to hide routers and cords. Wad-Free is a small business that launched during the pandemic and offers pads created using computer-aided design.

articles.title: 43 Problem-Solving Products For The Little Things You Ignored Around Your House For All Of 2024
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Several new home and personal care products are highlighted, including The Pink Stuff floor cleaner and stain remover, One Fur All odor-neutralizing candles designed for pet owners, CovoBox router covers, and various cleaning solutions from brands like Bissell, Better Life, and Goo Gone. There's also a focus on home improvement items, ranging from drywall repair putty to safety straps to window films.

articles.title: ‘Y'all ain't getting another dime from me': Customer buys Ninja Creami. Then she runs into this issue 6 months later
articles.author: Mars Ramos
articles.summary: Ninja Kitchen is set to release the Ninja Swirl in February, a new appliance that makes both regular and soft-serve ice cream. Influencers with early access have reviewed the product, generating buzz despite some concerns about upgrading from the existing Ninja Creami. The Ninja Swirl is positioned as a worthwhile purchase, especially for those who don't already own a Creami.

articles.title: LaCie debuts rugged Thunderbolt 5 portable SSDs
articles.author: Michael Crider
articles.summary: Seagate's LaCie brand announced its upcoming Rugged SSD Pro5 models at CES 2025. These portable drives, available in 2TB and 4TB, feature impact-resistant exteriors and high read speeds.

articles.title: I tested an ink pen that records your handwriting and makes a digital copy. Spoiler: It works
articles.author: Kyle Kucharski
articles.summary: Nuwa Pen, equipped with three tiny cameras, captures handwriting on paper and saves it in a digital library in the accompanying app. Users can search their scribbles by content, names, numbers, and keywords, as well as interact with the app's built-in large language model.

articles.title: If You Always Hit The Snooze Button Once Winter Hits, Here's 37 Things To Help You Get Ready Quickly
articles.author: Kayla Boyd
articles.summary: Several products are available to speed up the morning routine. The products include: a sunrise simulation alarm clock, a windshield ice cover, a microfiber hair towel, a scrunchie-towel hybrid, a body sponge with moisturizing body wash, a pack of body wipes, a dry shampoo foam, a mattifying powder dry shampoo, a tinted lip balm from Heartspring on Etsy, Maybelline BB cream, an air-dry leave-in cream, a bracelet holder, the Revlon one-step hair dryer and volumizer, a Remington wet-to-straight hair straightener, an automatic toothpaste dispenser, a 10-in-1 leave-in spray from Mane Club, a detangling brush, a clothing refresher spray, a hair-finishing stick, an edge control gel, a "defunk" spray from Uncle Funky's Daughter, a fragrant mist, a set of elastic lock laces, a waterproof eyeliner stamp, Glossier's Perfecting Skin Tint, L'Oréal illuminating moisturizer, a pack of flavored overnight oats, a bestselling eyebrow pencil, a pack of 24K cooling, hydrating eye gels, a knit satin-lined winter beanie from Beautifully Warm, a pack of knotted stretchy headbands, a set of 10 quick-dry nail polishes, an easy-to-use makeup-correcting stick, Essence's Lash Princess mascara, a set of eyeshadow patches and a Lay-n-Go cosmetic bag.

articles.title: Not Solely for Windows: Lenovo's New Handheld SteamOS Console Is Steamy Hot
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching the Go S with SteamOS, featuring an 8-inch touchscreen, Wi-Fi 6e, and USB4 ports. Lenovo also unveiled a prototype of its second-generation Go 2, which has faster RAM, a slightly larger OLED screen with a higher refresh rate, and an AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme processor.

articles.title: Lenovo Unveils AI-Powered Robotics for Retail
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching three new retail solutions. Lenovo Retail Content Management Services enables retailers to create, schedule, and display digital content across screens. Lenovo Retail Robotics with Yunji offers automated, independent deliveries to customers, and Lenovo AI Fast Start helps retailers prove the business value of AI use cases. Additionally, Lenovo has enhanced their TruScale as a Service offerings.

articles.title: Hear This: These Noise-Cancelling JBL Earbuds Are $50 Off Right Now
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: A limited-time deal offers sweat-resistant earbuds for $50, which is half the typical price. This promotion introduces a discounted price for the product.

articles.title: 39 Things For Anyone Trying To Ban Clutter From Their Home
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products for home organization available on Amazon and Etsy. These products include organizers for shoes, clothes, cleaning supplies, cords, hats, and various household items, as well as kitchen organizers for spices, pans, and refrigerator items. Mister Crafter offers a customizable leather cable organizer, Roomganize offers 24-pocket hanging shoe organizer, Dunn Rustic offers handmade Hat organizer, and Cilpastore offers handmade Vinyl rack.

articles.title: Don't miss Nectar's New Year mattress sale for up to 50% off
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Nectar is offering up to 50% off on its best-selling mattresses, including the Classic Memory Foam, Luxe Hybrid (with cooling technology), and Premier Memory Foam (with superior support). These discounts are part of the Nectar's New Year mattress sales, providing an opportunity to save on top-tier mattresses.

articles.title: Don't miss Nectar's New Year mattress sale for up to 50% off
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Nectar is offering up to 50% off during its New Year mattress sale. Customers can save on mattresses like the Nectar Classic Memory Foam Mattress, the Nectar Luxe Hybrid Mattress with enhanced cooling technology, and the Nectar Premier Memory Foam Mattress with superior support. Nectar mattresses offer features like unparalleled comfort, cooling technology, and durability, backed by a Forever Warranty and a 365-night trial.

articles.title: Cheap WHMCS Alternative Domain and Hosting Signup PHP Script with Add-ons - only $15
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is introduced as a cost-effective PHP script that serves as an alternative to WHMCS for domain and web hosting order management. It provides features such as AJAX-based domain checking with WHOIS lookup and a unified shopping cart experience for domains and hosting. domainCart allows for domain name sales and hosting package offers.

articles.title: Tesla launches new-look Model Y in China
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: Tesla introduced a redesigned Model Y, aimed at the Chinese and Asian-Pacific markets. This marks the first significant update to the vehicle.

articles.title: Frozen yogurt chain introduces new indulgent flavors
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Spanish frozen yogurt brand llaollao launched its 'Luxe' line in the Philippines. The new 'Luxe' line includes three frozen yogurt creations: Choco Soul, Cookie Mania, and Pistachio Lover. Choco Soul features a double dark choco brownie.

articles.title: Cloud Phone by CloudMosa review: Making feature phones 'smart'
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: CloudMosa is introducing Cloud Phone. Cloud Phone challenges the traditional notion of feature phones in a smartphone-dominated world.
